languages.text: "{name}, твои поступки вызывают у меня беспокойство. Значительное беспокойство. Было бы весьма прискорбно оказаться по разные стороны баррикад".
"{name}, your actions concern me. They concern me a great deal. It would be quite unfortunate if we found ourselves on opposing sides."
languages.original_text: "{name}, твои поступки вызывают у меня беспокойство. Значительное беспокойство. Было бы весьма прискорбно оказаться по разные стороны баррикад".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, your actions worry me. They worry me a great deal. It would be quite lamentable if you and I found ourselves on opposing sides."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, your actions worry me. They worry me a great deal. It would be quite lamentable if you and I found ourselves on opposing sides."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «{name}, me preocupan sus actos. Me preocupan mucho. Sería una verdadera lástima que acabásemos viéndonos en bandos opuestos».
languages.original_text: "{name}, your actions concern me. They concern me a great deal. It would be quite unfortunate if we found ourselves on opposing sides."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, me preocupan sus actos. Me preocupan mucho. Sería una verdadera lástima que acabásemos viéndonos en bandos opuestos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，你的行径引起了我的担忧。老实说，我十分担忧。如果我们最终不得不刀剑相向，那就太遗憾了。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, your actions concern me. They concern me a great deal. It would be quite unfortunate if we found ourselves on opposing sides."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，你的行径引起了我的担忧。老实说，我十分担忧。如果我们最终不得不刀剑相向，那就太遗憾了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Votre comportement me préoccupe, {name}. Je le trouve on ne peut plus inquiétant. Il serait regrettable que nous nous retrouvions dans des camps opposés. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, your actions concern me. They concern me a great deal. It would be quite unfortunate if we found ourselves on opposing sides."

traits.locale_text: « Votre comportement me préoccupe, {name}. Je le trouve on ne peut plus inquiétant. Il serait regrettable que nous nous retrouvions dans des camps opposés. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、あなたの行動は非常に気がかりだ。とても。もし我々が対立することとなったら、非常に残念に思う」
languages.original_text: "{name}, your actions concern me. They concern me a great deal. It would be quite unfortunate if we found ourselves on opposing sides."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、あなたの行動は非常に気がかりだ。とても。もし我々が対立することとなったら、非常に残念に思う」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, Eure Taten beunruhigen mich. Sie beunruhigen mich sehr. Es wäre höchst unerfreulich, wenn wir uns auf unterschiedlichen Seiten wiederfinden."
languages.original_text: "{name}, your actions concern me. They concern me a great deal. It would be quite unfortunate if we found ourselves on opposing sides."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, Eure Taten beunruhigen mich. Sie beunruhigen mich sehr. Es wäre höchst unerfreulich, wenn wir uns auf unterschiedlichen Seiten wiederfinden."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yaptıkların beni endişelendiriyor {name}. Hem de çok endişelendiriyor. Kendimizi karşıt taraflarda bulmamız hiç hoş olmaz."
languages.original_text: "{name}, your actions concern me. They concern me a great deal. It would be quite unfortunate if we found ourselves on opposing sides."

traits.locale_text: "Yaptıkların beni endişelendiriyor {name}. Hem de çok endişelendiriyor. Kendimizi zıt taraflarda bulursak hiç hoş olmaz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
